name: Pot of Gold
author: Snack Factory® Pretzel Crisps®
summary: Garnish trays of sweets with these little Pots of Gold to add some festivity to your spread!
ingredients: 1 (7.2 ounce) package Original Snack Factory® Pretzel Crisps®
1 (10.5 ounce) package rainbow candy belts (such as Airheads®)
directions: For each pot of gold you will need a whole Pretzel Crisps®, another Pretzel Crisps® with the round sides broken off, and a piece of licorice string
Place broken Pretzel Crisps® first, then layer whole on top allowing broken piece to peek out
Next put dipped licorice string at top of whole Pretzel Crisps®
Use chocolate to adhere rainbow belts to the back of the Pretzel Crisps® pots
Spread a little chocolate above the licorice string and sprinkle on some of the yellow confetti sprinkles as gold coins
